typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		cdatetime as string,
		address as string,
		district as string,
		beat as string,
		grid as string,
		crimedescr as string,
		ucr_ncic_code as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
source1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> sink1
